titleStmt.title: The sham-indictment quash'd being a true account of what passed at the Old-Baily the 20th of May, 1681, when the minister of Alhallows-Barkin, London, answered to Mr. Whitaker's indictment : together with some just reflections upon a libel called, The birth and burning of St. Michael, &c., lately published / by a lover of the loyal parish of Barkin.
titleStmt.author: Sanders, Jonathan.

notesStmt.note: Written by Jonathan Sanders. Cf. BM.
The "minister of Alhallows-Barkin" is Dr. Hicks. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
